pageContent: Background and objective: Erectile dysfunction is one of the complications occurring after radical prostatectomy (RP), and recovery of erectile function is quantitatively related to the preservation of the neurovascular bundles (NVB).We evaluated the significance of NVB area on functional outcomes after RP.

metaData.source:
Time to raise awareness regarding complications of androgen deprivation therapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22367185/
